name: The Last Run (IndieCade Submission)
description:
The Last Run is a 2D, action platformer based in a ending world with not-so-normal creatures, treasure and guns, of course.

Fight through countless, endless levels while fighting against monster moth-birds, balls of slime and guts, and spiders! *More to come*

Check out my twitter @bens_arcade for more info on this and other projects.

**Bugs can be reported to blustedgames@gmail.com or @bens_arcade on Twitter.
